memberdef.definition: virtual void rocalution::BaseAMG< OperatorType, VectorType, ValueType >::Aggregate_

memberdef.name: Aggregate_

briefdescription.para: Constructs the prolongation, restriction and coarse operator.
Base class for all algebraic multigrid solvers.

detaileddescription.para: The Algebraic MultiGrid solver is based on the BaseMultiGrid class. The coarsening is obtained by different aggregation techniques. The smoothers can be constructed inside or outside of the class.
All parameters in the Algebraic MultiGrid class can be set externally, including smoothers and coarse grid solver.

parameterdescription.para: - can be float, double, std::complex<float> or std::complex<double>
